summary: Frontend testing completed for PMD PAGOS bug fixes. All 3 bug fixes verified working correctly. All main functionalities tested and passing.

issues: Missing data-testid='advances-management' attribute on main container - page works but lacks test attribute

action_items: Consider adding data-testid='advances-management' to Adelantos page main container for better testability
critical_code_review_comments: ESLint warnings in App.js for missing dependencies in useEffect hooks (lines 896, 1328, 1789) - not critical but should be addressed
context_for_next_testing_agent: All bug fixes verified: 1) Edit employee modal includes Obra and Rubro fields and saves correctly, 2) Payment summary page has all 3 receipt buttons (Recibos Empleados, Recibos Contratistas, Todos los Recibos), 3) Attendance page works without overlay issues - cells are clickable and late hours modal opens correctly, 4) Contractor receipts show 'Certificación semanal' and 'Monto certificado', 5) Employee table shows Obra and Rubro columns

bug_fix_1_edit_modal.description: Edit employee modal includes Obra and Rubro fields
bug_fix_1_edit_modal.details: Modal opens correctly, both dropdowns work (3 project options, 5 trade options), saves successfully with toast 'Empleado actualizado exitosamente'

bug_fix_2_receipt_buttons.details: Found buttons: 'Recibos Empleados', 'Recibos Contratistas', 'Todos los Recibos'

bug_fix_3_attendance_overlay.description: Attendance page has no overlay issues
bug_fix_3_attendance_overlay.details: 28 attendance cells found, all clickable, late hours modal opens correctly

functionality_contractor_receipts.details: Found 'Certificación semanal', 'Monto certificado', 'Detalle de certificación' in contractor receipts

functionality_employee_table_columns.description: Employee table shows Obra and Rubro columns
functionality_employee_table_columns.details: Both columns visible in table header and data rows
